error.emptyField: Please fill in all the required fields
error.invalidPolicy: Please read and accept the policy
error.lowercaseMiss: Password should include at least 1 lowercase letter
error.uppercaseMiss: Password should include at least 1 uppercase letter
error.numberMiss: Password should include at least 1 number
error.specialKeyMiss: Password should include at least 1 special character
error.newPasswordNotChange: Current password and new password can't be the same
error.csrfTokenInvalid: Cookies has been tampered. Please login again
error.refreshTokenExpired: Your active session has expired. Please login again
error.minMaxSlots: Minumum value of max slots is 1!
error.dateInFuture: Date must be in the future!
error.dateAfterStart: End date must be after start date!

auth.verifyAccountAlert: Please verify your email to have the full experience
auth.verifyAccountSuccess: Verify account success. Please return to the homepage to use the app.
auth.verifyAccountFail: Verify account fail. The verify link appears to be invalid or expired. Please click the button below to receive a new link.
auth.alreadyVerified: You have been verified. Please return to the homepage to use the app.
